description: After witnessing her village being destroyed and slaughtered by the Oni demon, Hiroko has only one goal: revenge. Join this young samurai in this 2D side-scrolling platformer.

name: Human or Not
description: Aliens are entering Earth disguised as humans. It's your job to expose these imposters. Can you tell who is human and who is not? Choose your own path while you keep the Earth safe.

name: Soul Maze
description: Soul Maze is a 1-2 player Horror game. Run through the mazes collecting the souls of the monsters within in order to escape before you get caught and trapped forever

name: Just a Chest
description: The adventure of a hazy treasure chest, a prince without memory, a heroic slime and a cat who doesn't like her coat color.

name: Flames of Galinor
description: A highly customizable rogue-like deck builder set in a dystopian, dark fantasy realm. Enlist the aid of 3 heroes and battle through ever-changing encounters in a rich, lore-driven world. Amass great power with each successful battle. Grow your deck to its full potential. Death is at every corner!

name: Jack Big Chin: Alien Invasion
description: Save humanity! Help Jack Big Chin defeat the alien invaders, in an action-adventure game with 3D platform elements, where you must improve your weapons and activate cannons to complete your missions.

name: Super Dream-Weaver
description: A Retro RPG as a roguelike. Build a party with fully customizable classes and the freedom to build the character of your dreams. A game where choices matter and directly influence your play.

name: Making Lovers After Stories
description: Making Lovers After Stories contains the official extra stories for Making Lovers. Experience the crazy stories that are happening to your favorite girls!

name: Your Love Story
description: This is a AVG telling a realistic love story, which tells the story through interactive movies. It's about summer, youth memories and growth.

name: Super Maze Planet
description: Super Maze Planet is a relaxing Retro maze game that gives you bigger mazes as you progress through the levels. Super Maze Planet has over 900 mazes in 10 zones, with coins to pick up and characters to collect. When you earn enough gold you can unlock infinite procedural mazes too!

name: Star Trader
description: A shmup/adventure game by Nihon Falcom where you travel to different space stations, earning money and upgrading your ship.

name: PTRL Stockcar Edition
description: PTRL Stockcar Edition is a challenging arcade racer set in a fictional racing series of the 80s

name: CyVeRpunk
description: CyVeRpunk is a fast-paced VR on-rail shooter where the player works for the mob in a futuristic cyberpunk-themed city. No motion sickness.

name: The Good People: Na Daoine Maithe
description: The Good People (Na Daoine Maithe) is a lore-rich and choice-driven historical fantasy visual novel inspired by Irish mythology and Celtic folklore. Play as a tenant farmer from mid-19th century Ireland, whose path becomes inexplicably entwined in fairy affairs after getting robbed by the roadside and lured into the mythic and war-torn world of Tír na nÓg: A once unified land, now divided into the Seelie and Unseelie Courts. Will you escape and return home with your stolen belongings? Or does fate have something else in mind?

name: Lost in Tomorrow
description: The protagonist is an early AI robot sent to explore outer planets many years ago. When it returns to the earth after completing its mission, the earth at this time has changed. Click on the hidden props on the screen, and then drag the props in the props bar to the target position .

name: Radio Commander: Pacific Campaign
description: Fight against the Japanese Empire during the dire events of the Pacific War. Analyze the reports and send your orders via radio messages. Command massive fleets and aircraft squadrons at sea and on land. Change the tide of battle in non-linear gameplay - the outcome of the war is in your hands.

name: Rainbow Heights Academy: Year 1
description: You've been given the chance to go to the country's most prestigious academy. Your future couldn't have looked brighter! But you'll soon find out nothing is ever as it seems...

name: Pact of the Ancients
description: Pact of the Ancients is a 3D Bara Action RPG game about a group of mercenaries who set out on a mission in search of easy money and discover not everything is as easy as it seems.

name: Virus
description: You are a computer virus, programmed to to adapt and learn to aid in getting full access of different computers and servers. Will you be able to adapt fast enough to complete your job?

name: Hive
description: A tower-defence-like colony sim where you must extract resources from the land and produce fuel to escape the planet. Expand across each map researching various structures, creatively avoiding or engaging with local creatures to take their precious crystals. Research, Build, Expand, Extract!

name: Kaisa: Resurrection
description: You play as the puppet of Kaisa an undead confused octopus with a fuzzy ambitions for vengeance and power. During the day you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies to satisfy your masters needs. During the night... Well that's another story.

name: Counter-Stroke: Grand Building
description: A turn-based strategy game, you need to command a squad, break down from the top of the building floor by floor, use billiard cues and the skills of soldiers to defeat the enemy until the VIP is rescued.

name: Fitriz
description: Food puzzle game. Complete lines of food blocks and collect 175+ food items in 30 levels with the help of a raccoon.

name: Tempo Punk
description: Can you survive in an addicting fusion of rhythm-driven FPS action and captivating dystopian action-packed storytelling? Fight for your life through cutting-edge graphics while the pulsating beats of electronic music get your brain synapses firing at highspeed.

name: It Lives in the Woods
description: It Lives in the Woods is a first-person psychological horror set in the forests of Canada. You are Ibrahim, a father who has recently lost his daughter whilst on a hiking trip in the forest last winter. You hope to find what happened to your daughter and whether you can reunite with her.

name: Slayer: The Time of Ash and Dust
description: The time of glory has passed, and a new era has begun. Historian called this era "The time of ash and dust" A Slayer Enter the tower to save the world

name: RTD: Road to Desolace
description: Explore and survive in a broken down and decaying world, set 30 years after what is known as "The Collapse"

name: Demon Tomb
description: A first-person survival horror game, solve puzzles and search for supplies to arm yourself with as you explore to uncover the secrets of an old mansion. Fight, run or hide from all sorts of twisted horrors.

name: The Visit
description: The Visit puts you in control of Terry Mason, a strong minded tradesman who is vigorously a non believer when it comes to anything spiritual, after he agrees to a bet for $1,000 to stay in a haunted Manor House for 1 night, he sets off on a life changing event.

name: MMI
description: Solve puzzles, rotate the level and guide the main character to the teleport.

name: The Silent Sky: Part I
description: The Silent Sky is a hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure game about a boy who goes wandering while searching for his dog. Without even realizing it, while under the night's silent sky, his epic journey is about to begin.

name: TargetPop
description: Race the clock and aim for a highscore in this fast-paced, arcade style game! With ten themes to choose from, the way to play is yours. Climb to the top and reach 999 points where a greater challenge awaits…

name: Modern Fantasy: Urban Legends
description: Can you track the source of the Zombie Epidemic engulfing the rural island you're currently inhabiting before your lost friend falls victim to a deranged scientist? Explore a turn-based RPG with action elements while fighting against the undead, crazed people, enraged animals & unusual mutants!

name: Entangled
description: Relax to a story-driven puzzle platforming experience, solving puzzles using quantum entanglement. Entangle objects to find your way through a cave full of mysteries and friends. Embark on your journey through time in search of meaning in a life with no end.

name: Space Commander
description: The endless expanse of space has never been such a dangerous place. Take command as a Space Fleet Admiral who will face the challenge of galactic war and determine the fate of the universe.

name: Street Shuffle
description: Street Shuffle is a strategic card game with a focus on a party member system and combinations of different classes of cards, all set in an urban neighborhood with elements of street performance and hip hop.

name: Mona
description: Sin descripción

name: Clan Wars
description: Clan Wars game is a 3D turn based strategy online game combined with a fighting game one on one combat.

name: Insurgence: Bloodmoon
description: Insurgence: Bloodmoon is the third entry of the Insurgence series which tells the story of Richa and her friends in Valdera, a small island rife with mysteries.

name: Turbo Kid
description: Turbo Kid is a BMX-powered pixel-art Metroidvania gore-fest based on the film of the same name.

name: Code:Machina
description: Code:Machina is an anime-style hack and slash roguelike where the dolls of machina are designed to fight against the viruses that were destroying the cyber world.

name: SGS NATO's Nightmare
description: What if the Warsaw Pact had attacked NATO in the mid-1980s. Or the other way around? Study this titanic conflict, within its most emblematic theater, Germany and Central Europe. Will you be able to achieve your goals without escalating into an uncontrollable nuclear conflict?

name: Unables
description: Unables is really something else... A brand new comedy game with innovative, arcade gameplay, set in a cartoon world spoiled by extreme laziness. Our cast of classic heroes seem to have their "do nothing" skill maxed out. What to do when characters are so lazy, even you are unable to control them?

name: Epicenter VR
description: Save the last survivors after a deadly zombie virus has taken over your island home. Protect those closest to you at all costs and evacuate before supplies run out.

name: Ragdoll Game
description: Ragdoll Game is a 10-player physics based party game with various fun game modes to play.

name: Once Upon a Time... Life: Origins
description: Once Upon a Time... Life is a 2D co-op platformer meant for children and parents. The game will lead you through various places inside the human body and let you discover the secrets of its inner workings in an easy and accessible way.

name: Injustice 2: Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition contains:
•Access to 3 new fighters as they become available
•Exclusive gear shader usable on the entire roster
•Premiere skin with new look and dialogue for a specific character

DLC character Darkseid is also available as a pre-order bonus.

The physical Deluxe Edition comes in a SteelBook case.

name: Atrium Malum
description: You are an ordinary member of an expedition to explore new worlds. And one day you wake up as usual. But nothing else is usual on your ship anymore.

name: Love Love School Days
description: The protagonist is trapped in the world of a love game. Can you return to the real world again...? Try to escape while running away from the gal game heroine A love simulation-style survival horror game!

name: Name of the Will
description: You are informed to be a resident of Hope, a suspiciously harmonious community. Dodge the secretive governors, establish a rapport with your neighbors who monitor you, and solve puzzles to find out how you got here. Are you willing to sacrifice for the truth? Or, are you choosing a life of oblivion?

name: Connection Lost
description: The drug infused man will stop at nothing to reach the top of building in order to get network connection in his phone . Use your phone as a weapon in a cartoony mysterious world and fire up all your enemies with a powerful flame thrower.

name: Zakon
description: Dear soldier, Because of your recent achievements with terrorists, your social score is high enough to give you the opportunity to to be a first pilot of our new combat jet for special operations within the motherland. Keep us proud and don't let them move.

name: Raidborn
description:
Enough of wasting precious time by walking eternal distances and engaging in endless dialogue? Want to get to the fun part quickly? Say no more! Raidborn should be right up your alley.

Raidborn is a straightforward first-person fantasy action RPG featuring procedurally generated dungeons and quests. Plunder a treasure-strewn world, upgrade your gear, level up your skills, and hurl yourself into intense combat.

name: Hard Landing
description: An economic strategy where the player must adapt the colony to support human life on an uncharted planet. Production puzzles and unforeseen disasters await the player.

name: The City of Plague
description: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

name: Kikura
description: The second installment of the KIK series! "Utsushiyochigai" is a world that exists parallel to the present world in which we live, a world inhabited by gods and Yokai. This story is a new generation Urashima Taro, in which two girls confront yokai in order to solve the cursed beach incident!

name: Horny Punishment
description: Horny Punishment is a top-down adventure game for adults, where you are a powerful darklord who went rogue to become a farmer, but with your missing, other darklords start emerging and trying to conquer the world, so you must punish all those newcomers to try to disturb your peaceful life.

name: Herezh: Generations of Heroes
description: Herezh is a new multiplayer RPG/Survival hybrid game set in an immersive, procedurally generated world of Sword & Sorcery adventure inspired by Celtic myths, legends and culture.

name: Gossamer
description: You will get started in the school and encounter unexplained phenomena such as classmates who do not exist in the reality, but they have been recorded in your diary, the only class that is held in the whole school and your memory which has been tampering constantly.

name: Witch Girl Got Killed
description: Witch Girl Got Killed is a first-person fantasy horror action game. You are a magical girl trainee. Use magic and destroy the labyrinth while running away from monsters.

name: TruLove
description: TruLove is a visual novel with just a dash of stat raising. The game takes you through one complete college year, with changing seasons, college exams, and of course the all important holidays. Oh, and don’t forget dates with the girl of your choice!

name: Pirated Code: Admin Edition
description: When an AI program named Seren awakens to find they've been installed as the co-pilot of a smuggling ship, they'll have to rely on their newfound crewmates to help them find where they belong.

name: ShadoWave
description: Shadow Wave is a Metroidvania-style action rogue lite. Explore different biomes always with different arrangements. With the help of your faithful companion, move fast, be precise in combat and watch your powers grow stronger. Evolve in death and enjoy the path.

name: Movafort
description: Movafort is the world’s first time travel open world game, where you can travel to the future or the past to change the timeline without limits. Paradoxes will find you when it comes to bring items from the past with you.

name: Sweet Office
description: This is a game that combines relationship simulation and whac-a-Mole mode.The story takes place in the office of a company, you will meet three girls with different personalities. Help them solve their problems in work and life and win their favor.

name: Furry Sex: Poker
description: Furry Sex: Poker is a dating-sim-styled game where you have to beat your opponents in poker.

name: No Skirt Convenience Shop
description: In “Convenience Store Without Skirts” story, a 29 years old single male Duanmuyi, after traveling around the world, he back to his hometown – The Center City. To fulfill his foster mother’s dying wish, he spend all his money to run a convenience store and become a shop manage man.

name: Milk Girl: Sweet Memories of Summer
description: Adventure game of living together with a girl with mother milk in summer. You can move a pedestrian, talk to a girl, researching, earn money. Enjoy living together!

name: Hentai Cast: Podcast Simulator
description: Record your audience's lewd stories while you Make choices about them to raise your podcast popularity. Manage your money, Buy equipment, Make ad campaigns and Receive emails with the sexual adventures of your fans. Play a simulation game with visual novel features in which choices matter.

name: Hot Cam
description: Nancy wants to share her naughty and cute pictures, but she is a shy girl. She needs your help!

name: K-Pop Idol Stories: Road to Debut
description: A love letter to the thrilling world of K-pop! In this life simulator, you're the manager responsible for scouting talent, organising schedules, creating budgets, planning social media, choosing music, and styling your idols. Your goal? To debut the next big K-pop idol group!

name: Taste of Seduction
description: Taste Of Seduction is a 3D high-quality, first-person, story and dialogue-driven RPG adult game that blends together themes such as college life and that of a spy adventure.

name: Misty's Shining Blacksmithing
description: A world called Fillwitz has finally ushered in an era of peace after the long war between mankind and the demon. But Misty, who lives in the underground city of Gondalva and runs a blacksmith shop, is distressed by the sharp reduction in work caused by the peace.

name: Horny Witch Hunt
description: Once in a generation a mage is born who is so powerful they can't be beaten by ordinary force, they are called nymphomages, and they get their force by sucking the life out of other people through sexual acts. You are the only last living nymphomage, and the whole world is against you.

name: Hey Stranger! I Dare You to Love Me!
description: In this saucy 2D visual novel, you find yourself in a strange new town in which all of its residents are promiscuous and eager to get to know the newcomer! The story will depend entirely on your own choices. Will you give in to passion and accept the locals' blatant advances?

name: Cowgirl Adventures
description: "Cowgirl Adventures" is a strategy shooting casual puzzle game. Players will play the role of a cowgirl to pass through many levels, fight against various enemies, and finally capture them one by one Adventure story.

name: Incomer
description: First-person action game against hordes of alien intruders.

name: Gun Blade
description: Sin descripción

name: One Handed
description: Short Retro style sci-fi 3d shooter-platformer with shooting mechanics, where you play as a cyborg shooting and escaping from enemies.

name: VRealistic Fight: Aim For the Chest
description: A casual multiplayer pvp game where you can incapacitate your opponents and get a bigger advantage over them.

name: Living Legends: Bound by Wishes - Collector's Edition
description: Every dream can come true, for the right price. Your husband Jack has gone there, but when he doesn’t return, you follow in his footsteps. The town is threatened by enchanted roses that choke the life out of anyone they ensnare. Can you save your husband from his deadly contract?

name: Indenture
description: A Visual novel game about Kendo and girls. And the bad decision made by their parents long time ago. Get yourself immerse in the game with visually stunning CG scene and rich story telling about the family of Nishimura.

name: RTM: The Last Days
description: As the only survivor of a military plane crash, you find yourself in a mysterious island battling to stay alive and discover the dark secret that lies beneath the ground.

name: SCP: The Paranormal
description: SCP: The Paranormal puts you in the shoes of Agent Spring, a rookie S.C.P agent who's job is to investigate and fight the paranormal after the world has fallen to these paranormal creatures. Investigate strange paranormal SCP's in this SCP Foundation based indie game.

name: Metro MP
description: Visit all points of known and unknown metro stations, take tasks, collect any tin that catches your eye. Do not forget about the food that will go to you for a single dinner, because you will have no time to eat in this world.

name: Wicked Games
description: To get a "Ticket to Paradise" while being in Hell. A ticket that’s obviously worth it. A ticket that sends you to the obstacle path. What kind of road from Hell to Heaven could it be? What difficulties are awaiting you on this road? Are you worthy of a chance at redemption?

name: Velaster
description: Velaster is a gruesome 2.5D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

name: Redacted
description: A first-person zombie survival game.

name: Otherworld Legends: Ebonfang
description:
This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends in order to play.

A youthful martial combatant armed with throwing spikes who utilizes her blazing speed to unleash withering volleys of steel upon her foes from the air. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has fallen into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.

name: Enatus Radi
description: After the protagonist wakes up, he finds that he has lost his memory. The first girl he met named Ena also lost her memory. In order to find the reason and the truth, they embarked on a journey to the world.

name: Just Survival: The Zombie Awakening
description: Just Survival: The Zombie Awakening is an Early Access Version of an Open World Post-Apocalyptic Zombie Survival Game. This game immerses you in a unique Earth as humanity is fighting back & teaming up to take back control of the infected zombie hordes!

name: Rising Sun: Iron Aces
description: The Valkirias are here. Fast paced action Shoot 'em up with beautifully rendered 3D graphics. Select between four characters with different habilities and follow their story. Upgrade and unlock fighters, battle bosses and play amazing special stages, solo or with a friend.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 1 - Manhunt
description: A tactical action platformer where you play as Vlad “the Impaler”, the historical Dracula, the Lord and Voievod (war commander) of Wallachia. With your knights, you explore medieval Romania (Wallachia, Transylvania and Moldova) castle by castle, to hunt down your enemies!

name: TS!Underswap
description: An unofficial fan-game of Toby Fox's Undertale. Explore a re-imagined world based on the premise of swapping character roles, and adding original content, to create new scenarios.

name: Mexican Smashoff
description:
A single or multiplayer2D strategy board game that combines Chess, collectible card games, and turn-based battle games. All set in a Cyber-Punk version of the Mexican Revolutionary period.
This game combines game mechanics from chess, turn based strategy and card collection games.
The player chooses a Leader and assembles a team of fighters from a roster of distinct characters, and summon them one by one on a chess-like 2D board, where they can alternate between moving, attacking and defending each other's Leader.

name: Shadows on the Vatican: Act III - Sloth
description: The intrigue continues, as American doctor James Murphy and the professional assassin Silvia join forces to expose the members of a conspiracy that leads all the way to the highest levels of the Catholic Church before they’re silenced forever for what they know.

name: Hidden Through Time: Pirate Treasures
description: This DLC includes 10 new levels. It also features more than 300 new Pirate themed objects and characters, which will be in the level editor upon purchase!

name: Hidden Through Time: Aztec Rituals
description: This DLC includes a new story campaign featuring 10 new levels. It also contains more than 300 new Aztec Empire themed objects and characters, which will be in the level editor upon purchase!

name: Fast Food Shop Online
description: Go solo or invite your friends to run the fast food shop at your town! Survive, upgrade shop , buy farm and vehicles , and more!

name: Presence
description: Presence is a 2D tile based strategy game with RogueLike Elements. Explore randomly generated levels as you battle your way in a fierce turn based combat system. Gather loot and gain XP to ascend the Classes to gain ever more power.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific Heavy Challenger Steam Loco
description: The last decades of the steam era in America produced many of the largest, best, and most extraordinary locomotives ever to grace steel rails – and among these landmark locomotives was Union Pacific’s magnificent 3900-class 4-6-6-4 “Challenger.”

name: Wars Across the World: Sepoy 1857
description: Sepoy 1857 accounts for the great Indian Mutiny, a major uprising in India in 1857–58 against the rule of the British East India Company, which functioned as a sovereign power on behalf of the British Crown.

name: Colorful
description: Colorful is a hack-n-slash that combines acrobatic freeform movement with fast-paced combat. You wake up in an unknown lifeless world where strange shadow creatures have consumed its color.

name: The Sentinel Remake
description:
Welcome to Sentinel Island, a place where the modern world collides with primal forces under the tyrannical rule of Wandal. As a modern man, you must navigate this wild landscape, crafting tools of science to survive against the relentless tribe. Use strategy to outsmart brutal enemies and master immersive mechanics while uncovering dark secrets hidden in the shadows and Bill Black's past.

As you explore the island, confront the remnants of your past and grapple with the question of what 'true civilization' really means. The Sentinel Remake is a first-person survival horror and immersive sim game that brings the character Bill Black to life. Help him navigate various challenges, interact with diverse inhabitants, and unveil the mysteries of his dark history.

In The Sentinel Remake, solve problems in your own way, using your unique strategy. Choose stealth to evade enemies, craft tools for defense, or distract them to create an opening.

Prepare for a struggle between modernity and primal chaos—your journey begins now!

name: Truck Driver: Heading North
description: Expand your Truck Driver experience with the 'Heading North' DLC! Drive around beautiful Nordic inspired landscapes as you continue your trucking career and complete numerous jobs for new characters.

name: Puppeteer
description: Following a challenge, 5 friends decided to enter an abandoned school, after entering the school, they realized that they made the biggest mistake of their lives.

name: Presentable Liberty Remake
description: In the midst of a pandemic you are imprisoned and alone in a cell. You cannot escape this cell. All you can hear day in and day out is the ticking of the clock in your cell. You may still receive letters, but you cannot reply to them.

name: Space Trucker
description: Space Trucker is a "realistic" space simulator where you fly your cargo ship to different places within the solar system. Configure you ship, maneuver for departing and docking, plan your high speed flight, and execute it all without breaking space rules - or killing yourself!

name: Anvil Life
description: In this game that offers unlimited fun in Singleplayer, Sandbox game type; You will be able to upgrade your items, expand your military, win loot with quests, and try many combinations to bring the characters to the state you want.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Anime 4
description: Awesome anime images provided by Studio Ghibli, directly from their movies.

name: Exodus
description: Exodus, a realtime strategy PC game featuring stunning photorealistic graphics, oldschool RTS gameplay mechanics mixed with our own fresh ideas and a thrilling horror infused story about a dystopian alternative timeline of human history.

name: Pretty Girls Breakout! Plus
description: "Pretty Girls Breakout!", A batting action-type breakout game that hits, hits, and hits back, is powered up! New game modes and new gimmicks have been added to make "Pretty Girls Breakout! Plus"!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Paris
description: Puzzles of Paris!

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - TGV Duplex
description: The TGV Duplex is a French high-speed train of the TGV family, manufactured by Alstom, and operated by the French national railway company SNCF. It is unique among TGV trains in that it features bi-level carriages. The Duplex inaugurated the third generation of TGV trainsets.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - TGV Duplex
description: The TGV Duplex is a French high-speed train of the TGV family, manufactured by Alstom, and operated by the French national railway company SNCF. It is unique among TGV trains in that it features bi-level carriages. The Duplex inaugurated the third generation of TGV trainsets.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - TGV Duplex
description: The TGV Duplex is a French high-speed train of the TGV family, manufactured by Alstom, and operated by the French national railway company SNCF. It is unique among TGV trains in that it features bi-level carriages. The Duplex inaugurated the third generation of TGV trainsets.

name: Touhou Genso Maroku W: The Devil of Decline - Shikigami Additional Contents
description: The number of monster shikigami that can be added to the group will increase.

name: Clan Generator
description:
ClanGen is a game that lets you generate a Clan and then follow their story as it unfolds, perhaps influencing some of their decisions along the way. With, quite literally, millions of unique cat appearances to generate, multiple biomes and camps to live within, and hundreds of events to discover, ClanGen is full of possibilities! What will your Clan look like? A pixel Warrior Cats game with randomly generated cats and personalities. Grow your clan and discover what lore you want to make!

A fan continuation of Clan Generator by just-some-cat.

name: Revival AO
description: Revival AO is an online RPG based in a medieval fantasy world.

name: Cruxade
description: Inspired by Pen and Paper and Souls-Like combat. Cruxade is a anime-styled Fantasy Action Adventure Role-Playing Game, with the ability to choose between a solo or multiplayer experience.

name: Wings of Glory
description: Rule the skies in strategy dogfights in the digital adaptation of the classic tabletop board game!

name: Five Nights With James
description: Five Nights With James is a Five Nights At Freddy's Fan game which contains funny memes and funny lore.

name: Stagnated In Slumber
description:
Wake up, go to sleep. That is all you have to do.

Stagnated In Slumber is a short RPG Maker game about a meaningless life of a meaningless character. Play as Agnes, a girl stuck at home, sleeping through day after day. Explore around the house and, if you are lucky, find something interesting to do.

name: Beyond the Harbor: R
description:
Two years ago, Oliver Blanche disappeared.

An aspiring detective catches wind of the case, and decides that if nobody else was going to solve this, he would. Little did he know, that he was involving himself with something much bigger.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Special Edition
description:
The Special Edition includes:

Exclusive red SteelBook case
Red Son DLC Pack
20 additional missions set within the Red Son storyline

name: Nekobabaa: Melonbooks Omake Tokubetsu-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Apathy: Rental Kazoku
description:
A man who seeks a family.
A girl who remembers father only in her memories.
A young man who is entangled in lies.
A child who has no place to return to.
This is a story where these people meet and find happiness in each other. And thus a small miracle is born.

name: Apathy Hayarigami
description: Sin descripción

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Shinsei 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Himitsu
description:
Project celebrating the 25th anniversary of Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi.
The choices were chosen based on Twitter's polls and a contest was held to find new branching scenarios.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Kiwame
description:
This is a "schoolhouse horror story" that happened in another world.

High school students have gathered from all over the country to tell scary stories that happened at school. However, the gathering is led in an unexpected direction.

The largest text adventure horror in the Apathy series with over 400 branches with 147 endings.

name: Apathy: Napoli no Otoko-tachi in Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi
description: Sin descripción

name: Gakkou de Atta Koii Hanashi
description: A parody of the Apathy series that combines the saga's traditional horror and murder with romance elements.

name: Gakkoi 2: Unmei Ai ha Inochigake
description: Sin descripción

name: Gakkoi: Ai to Noroi to Valentine
description:
I had to transfer to Narushin Gakuen because of my parents' job. On the first day of my new school, I was approached by a fortune teller on the road.

"...You'll die in another month"

Suddenly, my life is over.

Continuing on, the fortune teller says, to avoid that death, it seems that I have to find a "heartfelt loved one"...

Is love or death waiting!? A life-threatening love story begins here!!

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Her Nightmares: Redacted
description: Dwell deep into her nightmares & uncover the truth.

name: SorcerLand
description:
A 2D action-platforming adventure about two beastkin sorcerers, Alines and Rabina-Lop, protecting their home, Sorcerland, from the evil Machine Empire. During an intense battle, they were saved by a friendly pony-bot named Machina, a warrior serving Machineland. From there, the three protagonists go on to adventure across the lands, saving innocents and removing the machines that spread terror and destruction.

Developed by a single individual known as Zaruku, it boasts mechanics and progression similar to old mascot platformers, but with attacks and special moves reminisicent of hack-n'-slash games. The sprites and animations are bright and colorful, and there are manga-like cutscenes to help immerse you in the world through dialogue and art.

Unfortunately, the last time the creator has posted on their developer blog was December 25th 2014, and there have been no updates since. Due to this, it seems that SorcerLand may never see the full completion that the developer intended.

name: Whack First!: Fight the Moles
description: The moles are trying to destroy the farm. Use your hammer to hit them and save the infected crop. Get the highest scores and take on your friends.

name: Samurai Maiden
description: A young woman from the 21st century with sharp swordsmanship skills finds herself in Honnō-ji during the Sengoku period! Together with a trio of newfound ninja friends, she races through the Underworld beneath Honnō-ji, confronted by enraged corpses at every turn!

name: Strikers 1945 III for Nintendo Switch
description: This hardcore 90s arcade shooter was Psikyo's challenge to the world! Now with online rankings!

name: Solitaire Master VS
description: Classic solitaire card game!

name: My Cute Unicorns: Coloring Book
description: They are so cute, try to color this amazing creatures!

name: Logic Pic
description: Solve puzzles to discover pictures. Fun makes you smarter!

name: Kid Ball Adventure
description: Bounce your way through 100 rooms packed with perilous traps and devious enemies on a quest to save your lost love!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Retro House
description: "Japanese Escape Games :The Retro House" is a mystery, adventure games. Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles.

name: City Super Hero 3D: Flying Legend Warriors Deluxe Simulator
description: Get strong and agile to become the best super hero of the city! Fight criminals and villains to keep the citizens of the city safe!Explore a large and modern metropolis!

name: Avenging Spirit
description: Creative and complex platform action with a unique supernatural touch

name: Artsy Pixel
description: Relaxing game about coloring pixelart images.

name: Amazin' George 2: Digital Deluxe
description: More cat and maze and JRPG fun! We've updated George and his friend's appearence to look even cuter and more realistic than ever.

name: Adventure Trip: New York - Collector's Edition
description: Want to experience the adventure of the Big Apple? From the lush green Central Park to the city view from the Brooklyn Bridge and beautiful historical landmark such as the classic Rockefeller Center. The game will take you through 20 ethereal locations.

name: We don't die here
description: An unknown enemy has descended on your world. Population decimated from 10 billion to a little over 100 survivors. This is your extinction event. You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this. But, you are about to be overrun...

name: One Piece Clicker
description: One Piece Clicker is an open source game built around the story of the One Piece manga. This is an idle & clicker type game.

name: EleMetals: Deluxe Edition
description: Pick one of six metalheads and SHRED your friends in this battle royal. Along with the base game, the new player DLC lets you listen to the best ELEMETAL music.

name: After Wave: Downfall
description: After Wave: Downfall is an arcade shooter where the player battles against monsters, completes various missions with a cool battleship. Deathrix invaded the world and released a mysterious meteorite causing a great flood. Players can upgrade their ships for better performance to fight the most brutal enemies. A Local Co-op mode allows the player to team up and adventure with others.

name: Bright Paw: Definitive Edition
description: Murder, mystery, puzzles and cats.

name: Bright Memory: Infinite - Platinum Edition
description: Bright Memory: Infinite is an epic fusion of the FPS and action genres brought to you by indie developer FYQD-Studio. Combine a range of skills and abilities to unleash dazzling combos on your enemies.

name: To Libertad
description: A short story of a slave and her journey to freedom

name: Babe or Grave
description: Babe or be graved

name: In the Grass
description: A little game no one should play.

name: Planitis
description: The universe needs order!

name: Knockbots
description: Sin descripción

name: Impact Space
description: Simple Arcade Shooter for the Playdate

name: Hina-chan Breaker: 2nd Break
description: A doujin game by ISY based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Skwish
description: Tidy blocks and solve brainteasers in this satisfying puzzle game!

name: Vampire Curse
description:
The Vampire Curse has struck you! Play as a vampire who wants to find a way to end his eternal thirst for blood. Explore the First Vampire's manor and discover its secrets, avoid the traps and fight anyone who stands in your way.
But be quick ! Without blood, your energy will decrease, and you will faint!

name: Fire Hose
description: An action game for Playdate. Put out fires!

name: Rainblocks
description: A chill falling blocks game for the Playdate.

name: Rocket Bytes
description: A precision rocket flying reverse platformer

name: Time From Earth
description:
Time From Earth is a narrative adventure game where you'll experience a day-to-day system, speaking to everyone & completing tasks and at the end of the day, head back to the accommodation to start the next day.

Play through simple mini-games to help maintain the ship and learn about what's happened in the 30 years between now and the flight of Physis 5.
Uncover a mystery onboard the ship...

name: Covert Critter
description: Covert Critter is a top-down sneaking game and retro throwback to stealth titles of the mid to late 90's. As elite agent Koss, your goal is to navigate through each of the 10 unique stages, all while remaining silent and out of the enemy's sight. The terrorist group known as the Red Hawks are vigilant creatures, armed to the beak, and around every corner of the facility.

name: Cranner
description: An endless runner for the Playdate. Dodge and jump for the high score as a crab.

name: Chosen Dice
description: A Tile-Matching Puzzle Dice Game, only on Playdate.

name: Shock Troops
description:
The Shock Troops are sent anywhere in the Galaxy where a problem needs to be solved with extreme prejudice.
Players will shoot their way through an epic interstellar adventure and uncover a dark conspiracy to end mankind.

Inspired by classics such as Doom and Quake, Shock Troops visual features include pixel-art textures and a mix of 3D environments and 2D sprites, seamlessly blending classic style with modern lighting.

Shock Troops gameplay aims at preserving the high-octane physicality of the classic shooters. Players will dodge incoming projectiles while responding in kind with a varied arsenal with various effects, at range, or in melee, with some impressive weapons or special powers.

You will be fighting your way through derelict space stations, frozen colonies, mining asteroids, large military spaceships, and lush alien planets. Each of these worlds will feature large “open” areas, set-pieces and theater of epic firefights.

name: Revolution: War of Independence
description: Sin descripción

name: Fists For Fighting Fx3
description: Put gloves on and use your fists to achieve your goal. In Fx3 take the role of different fighters, each fighting for different reasons and giving everything of whether to beat all their opponents.

name: Oita, Beppu Mystery Annai: Yuganda Tourou
description: Sin descripción

description: Grab a MultiVersus Founder's Pack for Instant Character Unlock Tokens, Exclusive Items, and more!

name: MultiVersus: Founder's Pack - Premium Edition
description: Grab a MultiVersus Founder's Pack for Instant Character Unlock Tokens, Exclusive Items, and more!
